Name: SUPERSTAR SHOES
Description:
SUPERSTAR SHOES
THE AUTHENTIC LOW TOP WITH THE SHELL TOE.
Originally made for basketball courts in the '70s. Celebrated by hip hop royalty in the '80s. The adidas Superstar shoe is now a lifestyle staple for streetwear enthusiasts. The world-famous shell toe feature remains, providing style and protection. Just like it did on the B-ball courts back in the day.

Now, whether at a festival or walking in the street you can enjoy yourself without the fear of being stepped on.

The serrated 3-Stripes detail and adidas Superstar box logo adds OG authenticity to your look.

Name: BUSENITZ PRO SHOES
Description:
BUSENITZ PRO SHOES
RUGGED SKATE SHOES FOR EVERY MOVE.
This style is the result of a collaboration between adidas Action Sports and Dennis Busenitz. These shoes transform the Copa Mundial football boot into skate shoes built for Dennis' signature all-terrain skating. With a durable upper, cupsole construction and a Geofit collar, the shoes will help you take on any obstacle.

Name: DELPALA SHOES
Description:
BUSENITZ PRO SHOES
RUGGED SKATE SHOES FOR EVERY MOVE.
This style is the result of a collaboration between adidas Action Sports and Dennis Busenitz. These shoes transform the Copa Mundial football boot into skate shoes built for Dennis' signature all-terrain skating. With a durable upper, cupsole construction and a Geofit collar, the shoes will help you take on any obstacle.

Name: DELPALA X FMF SHOES
Description: George Orwell

Name: ZX 1K BOOST SHOES
Description:
ZX 1K BOOST SHOES
ULTRA-COMFORTABLE SHOES WITH A HIGH-VISIBILITY LOOK.
In a constantly evolving world, keeping up is just part of the routine. Stay on top of it in these airy knit mesh adidas shoes. The ZX series has merged technology with culture since the '80s. Today a combination of Boost and EVA cushioning keeps you comfortable as you charge through the day.


SPECIFICATIONS
Lace closure
Knit mesh upper
Stable feel
Boost and EVA midsole
Rubber outsole
Imported
Product color: Dark Blue / Cloud White / Core Black
Product code: H68719

Name: NMD_R1 SHOES
Description:
BUSENITZ PRO SHOES
RUGGED SKATE SHOES FOR EVERY MOVE.
This style is the result of a collaboration between adidas Action Sports and Dennis Busenitz. These shoes transform the Copa Mundial football boot into skate shoes built for Dennis' signature all-terrain skating. With a durable upper, cupsole construction and a Geofit collar, the shoes will help you take on any obstacle.

Name: Nike Blazer Mid '77 Suede
Description: The Nike Blazer Mid '77 Vintage Suede harnesses the old-school look of Nike b-ball with a vintage midsole finish, making it look like you've been saving them for years. Its luscious suede, retro Swoosh and padded collar make it a modern staple while the ultra-clean colors add a crisp look that completes any outfit.

Name: Nike Air VaporMax Evo
Description:
The Nike Air VaporMax EVO puts Air Max DNA under the microscope to showcase the distinguishing features of 7 Nike icons. From stitched overlays, to classic accents to unbelievable comfort and overt '90s styling, it splices the must-haves of your favorite Air Max shoes onto 1 new design. Evolve your look and feel the comfort of everything Max.

Shown: White/Wolf Grey/Dark Grey/Black
Style: CT2868-100

Name: Nike React Live
Description:
All day, every day the Nike React Live lets you shine, mixing innovation like the cable lacing system with the smooth, comfortable ride of React technology. Its exposed needlework and mixed-material upper add DIY appeal while its low-cut track silhouette nods to the history of Nike running.

Shown: Black/Dark Smoke Grey/White
Style: CV1772-003

Name: Nike Blazer Mid '77 Vintage
Description: In the ‘70s, Nike was the new shoe on the block. So new in fact, we were still breaking into the basketball scene and testing prototypes on the feet of our local team. Of course, the design improved over the years, but the name stuck. The Nike Blazer Mid ’77 Vintage—classic since the beginning.

Name: Converse Color Vintage Canvas Chuck 70 High Top
Description:
Taking cues from laidback summer days, we've updated the premium Chuck 70 with durable 12oz vintage canvas in new colors inspired by the warmth of the sun. The Chuck 70 mixes the best details from the ’70s-era Chuck with impeccable craftsmanship and premium materials. An elevated style icon, it features lightweight cushioning to keep you looking—and feeling—good all day.
PRODUCT DETAILS
Crafted in a recycled poly-canvas for an elevated feel.
Premium cushioning provides all-day comfort and support.
New Converse colors to refresh your rotation.
Shiny, taller rubber sidewall and winged tongue stitching.
Heritage details like a 1970s heel logo nod to its legacy.

Name: Converse Color Chuck Taylor All Star High Top
Description: Saint-exupery

Name: Summer Wave Chuck Taylor All Star High Top
Description:
HEAT WAVE.
Just in time for laidback summer days, we've updated your go-to Chucks with bold tie dye-inspired graphics. A wave of washed, tonal color brings a beachy vibe to your look, while unmistakable All Star features keep it classic.

Name: SUPERNOVA SHOES
Description: SUPERNOVA SHOES HIGH-PERFORMANCE RUNNING SHOES FOR SHORT AND LONG RUNS. Your run starts before your feet even hit the pavement. With a spark, a goal or a desire to be your best self. Lace into these adidas running shoes and the run starts now. High-performance elements like responsive cushioning and supportive overlays keep you cruising in comfort. The breathable, seamless upper means cool feet even when you ramp up the speed.
